question:
Which of the following statements is/are true regarding Sohum?
  1. It is an indigenously developed new born hearing screening device
  2. It has been launched by Ministry of Family and Health Welfare
  3. It uses combination of cathodes to read auditory signals
Select the correct option form the codes given below:
explanation:
Statement 1 is correct: SOHUM, an indigenously developed newborn hearing screening device by School of International Bio design.
Statement 2 is incorrect: It has been launched by the Union Ministry of Science and Technology (not Ministry of Family and Health Welfare).
Statement 3 is correct: It measures auditory brain waves via three electrodes placed on the baby’s head. When stimulated, electrodes detect electrical responses generated by the brain’s auditory system. If there is no response, it indicates child cannot hear.
